title: ssh/terminal: fails to install on Mac OS X
body:
by **phmmnd**: 
What steps will reproduce the problem?

1. On Mac OS X, run `go get code.google.com/p/go.crypto/ssh/terminal`

What is the expected output?

No output, expected terminal package to install

What do you see instead?

# code.google.com/p/go.crypto/ssh/terminal
../../../code.google.com/p/go.crypto/ssh/terminal/util.go:27: undefined: syscall.Termios

Which compiler are you using (5g, 6g, 8g, gccgo)?

6g

Which operating system are you using?

Mac OS X 10.7.5

Which version are you using?  (run 'go version')

go1.0.3

Please provide any additional information below.

It looks like the last commit to go.crypto/ssh/terminal
(https://code.google.com/p/go/source/detail?r=75e869cbf335427fa8d03e0943662b56b1318ee8&;repo=crypto&path=/ssh/terminal/util.go)
is only compatible with go 1.1.
